question:
The average (arithmetic mean) of 13 numbers is 70. If the average of 10 of these numbers is 90, what is the average of the other 3 numbers?
(A) \(-130\)
(B) \(\frac{10}{3}\)
(C) \(30\)
(D) \(90\)
(E) \(290\)
